Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package model.gamestates

Interface GameState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EndGameState, GodPickState, GodSelectionState, PlaceBuilderState, TurnState
    public interface GameState
    Interface for the States of the GameState machine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Game.State getStateIdentifier()
      This method gets the unique identifier of this state

    • Method Detail

      • submitGodList

        boolean submitGodList​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> godNamesList)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This methods creates the instances of all the gods selected and sends the update to all the clients
        Parameters:
        godNamesList - The names of the gods selected by the player
        Returns:
        True if this method is called from the correct state. False otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the list does not have the correct structure

      • pickGod

        boolean pickGod​(java.lang.String playerName,
                java.lang.String godName)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method links the selected got to the current player
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name of the player caller
        godName - The name of the god selected
        Returns:
        True if this method is called from the correct state. False otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the name of the god is Invalid or when the player who calls this method is not the current player

      • selectCoordinate

        boolean selectCoordinate​(java.lang.String playerName,
                         Coordinate coordinate)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method creates a builder on the board at the given coordinate
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name of the player caller
        coordinate - The coordinate where the builder will be placed
        Returns:
        True if this method is called from the correct state. False otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the Coordinate is invalid (either not in the board or already occupied) or when the Player who calls this method is not the current player

      • quitGame

        boolean quitGame​(java.lang.String playerName)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method instantly transitions the game to the End Game State
        Parameters:
        playerName - The player calling the method
        Returns:
        True if this method is called from the correct state. False otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the player caller is not in the game

      • getStateIdentifier

        Game.State getStateIdentifier()
        This method gets the unique identifier of this state
        Returns:
        The enum identifier of the state
